name: 4th Dimension Database Log File
summary: Learn about .4DL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Multiple 4DL files are often saved along with a 4DD file. For example, a database named "db1.4dd" may generate an initial log file named "db1[0001-0000].4dl." If the database has bee saved 5 times, the program will generate a log file named "db1[0005-0000]." If the log file itself is then saved 3 times, it will be named "db1[0005-0003].4dl."

description: A 4DL log file is utilized to record modifications made to a 4D database (.4DD) file. This file is stored alongside the database file and shares a similar filename. Its purpose is to accurately track and maintain a comprehensive record of the updates implemented within the database. A 4DD file, as compared to the 4DL file, is mainly associated with the 4th Dimensions by the 4D Inc.
Log file that stores a record of changes to a 4D database (.4DD) file; saved along with the database file and uses a similar filename; designed to keep track the updates made to the database.
